name: COALITION FOR EQUITABLE REGULATION AND TAXATION
description: Interest in legislative matters affecting the rare coin and precious metals markets.
sampleDescriptions: Importation of counterfeit coins and bullion.  Anti-counterfeiting efforts to coordinate law enforcement, customs, and treasury and provide expert assistance in detection.

Taxation of numismatic items and bullion, inclusion in IRA accounts for tax deferral.
Anti-counterfeiting measures suggested to be utilized by the United States Mint.
Capital gains taxes on numismatic
